title: BMW Supplier Quality Control Success
content:
Challenge: A tier-1 BMW supplier struggled with manual quality inspection of 50,000+ parts daily, leading to 5% defect rate and costly recalls.

Solution: Implemented DefectDetect Pro, our computer vision system using self-supervised learning with MoCo architecture. System processes images at 100ms per part.

Results:
- Defect detection improved to 99.2% accuracy
- False positive rate reduced from 8% to 0.3%
- ROI achieved in 6 months
- Annual savings: €2.1M
- Integration with existing SAP system completed in 3 weeks

Technology: PyTorch, ResNet-50 backbone, Edge deployment on NVIDIA Jetson

title: E-Commerce Recommendation Engine - Fashion Retailer
content:
Challenge: German fashion retailer (€50M revenue) had 68% cart abandonment rate and low cross-sell conversion.

Solution: Deployed AI-powered recommendation system combining collaborative filtering and visual similarity search. Real-time personalization based on browsing behavior.

Results:
- Cart abandonment reduced to 42%
- Average order value increased 23%
- Cross-sell conversion improved from 3% to 11%
- System handles 10,000 concurrent users
- A/B testing showed 17% revenue lift

Technology: LightGBM, CLIP embeddings, Redis caching, AWS SageMaker

title: Predictive Maintenance - Industrial Equipment
content:
Challenge: Siemens partner experienced unexpected equipment failures causing €500K monthly losses in downtime.

Solution: Built IoT sensor-based predictive maintenance system. LSTM models analyze vibration, temperature, pressure data to predict failures 48 hours in advance.

Results:
- Unplanned downtime reduced by 73%
- Maintenance costs decreased 31%
- Equipment lifespan extended 18%
- System monitors 250+ machines in real-time
- Mobile alerts for maintenance teams

Technology: Azure IoT Hub, LSTM networks, Time series forecasting, Power BI dashboards

title: Fraud Detection System - Fintech
content:
Challenge: German neobank detected only 62% of fraudulent transactions, losing €1.2M annually. High false positive rate (15%) frustrated legitimate customers.

Solution: Implemented real-time fraud detection using ensemble models (XGBoost + Isolation Forest). Graph neural networks analyze transaction patterns.

Results:
- Fraud detection rate: 96.8%
- False positives reduced to 2.1%
- Average detection latency: 47ms
- Saved €980K in first year
- Compliant with BaFin regulations

Technology: XGBoost, Graph Neural Networks, Kafka streaming, PostgreSQL

title: DefectDetect Pro - Computer Vision Platform
content:
DefectDetect Pro is our flagship computer vision platform for automated quality control.

Key Features:
- Real-time defect detection (<100ms latency)
- Self-supervised learning - minimal labeled data needed
- Edge deployment support (NVIDIA Jetson, Intel NCS)
- Integration with major industrial systems (SAP, Siemens PLC)
- Explainable AI - visual heatmaps show decision reasoning
- Multi-class detection (scratches, dents, color defects, dimensional issues)

Pricing:
- Starter: €15,000 (up to 5 cameras)
- Professional: €45,000 (up to 20 cameras)
- Enterprise: Custom pricing
- 30-day trial available

Deployment: 2-4 weeks typical
Training required: 500-2000 images
Support: 24/7 for Enterprise

title: SmartRecommend - Personalization Engine
content:
SmartRecommend delivers real-time personalized recommendations for e-commerce platforms.

Key Features:
- Multi-modal recommendations (text, image, behavior)
- A/B testing framework built-in
- Cold-start handling for new users/items
- Integration with Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento
- GDPR-compliant data handling
- Real-time model updates
- Mobile SDK for native apps

Performance:
- <50ms recommendation latency
- Handles 100,000 concurrent users
- 99.9% uptime SLA

Pricing:
- Based on MAU (Monthly Active Users)
- Starter: €500/month (up to 10K MAU)
- Growth: €2,000/month (up to 100K MAU)
- Enterprise: Custom

Free trial: 14 days
